items.description: A user-bound notification. For instance, a notification updating the user about the status of a scheduled delivery.

notificationID.description: A unique ID for differentiating notification objects

notificationDescription.description: A displayable description of the notification.

isEnabled.description: An indicator of whether the user has enabled this notification or not. By default, true.

day.description: Day of the week, enumerated. Sunday = 0, Saturday = 6. -1 denotes a notification that has no relationship to a given day.
